tool_description: Performs a comprehensive audit of all graduation requirements including courses, credits, GPA, and special requirements to determine graduation eligibility.

catalog_year.description: Academic catalog year in YYYY-YYYY format

completed_courses.description: Array of all completed course codes

course_grades.description: Array of grades for all completed courses

course_credits.description: Array of credit hours for all completed courses

special_requirements_completed.description: Array of completed special requirements (internship, thesis, etc.)

intended_graduation_term.description: Intended graduation term in format 'Fall YYYY' or 'Spring YYYY'

error_messages: Student record not found: The provided student_id does not exist in the system.
Program not found: The specified program code does not exist in the catalog year.
Array length mismatch: completed_courses, course_grades, and course_credits must have equal lengths.
Invalid audit type: audit_type must be 'preliminary', 'official', or 'final'.
Incomplete academic record: Cannot perform audit without complete course and grade information.
Invalid graduation term: intended_graduation_term must be in format 'Fall YYYY' or 'Spring YYYY'.
Catalog year mismatch: Student's catalog year does not match the specified catalog_year parameter.
usage: Provide complete student academic information including courses, grades, credits, and program details. The tool performs a comprehensive graduation audit and identifies any remaining requirements.

graduation_eligible.description: Whether the student is eligible for graduation

satisfied_requirements.description: Array of degree requirements that have been satisfied

outstanding_requirements.description: Array of requirements that still need to be completed

credit_summary.description: Summary of credit hours earned vs. required

gpa_status.description: GPA requirement status and current standing

estimated_completion.description: Estimated term when all requirements could be completed
